images.alt: Timeline of the observable universe with CMB epoch
images.caption: Standard cosmological timeline including recombination and the CMB.

images.heading: How It Works
images.alt: Hubble Ultra Deep Field showing thousands of galaxies
images.caption: The Hubble Ultra Deep Field reveals thousands of galaxies in a tiny patch of sky, demonstrating the vastness of the observable universe.

images.heading: Testable Predictions
images.caption: CMB anisotropies provide precision tests of early-universe predictions.
